original: Lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: lokiyam dhammam paṭicca na lokuttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: lokuttaram dhammam paṭicca na lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā lokuttaram dhamma

original: paṭicca nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokiyo
analyzed: paṭicca na lokiyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā lokuttaram dhammam paṭicca na lokiyaḥ

original: ca nalokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.)
analyzed: ca na lokuttaraḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: lokiyam ca lokuttaram ca dhammam paṭicca na lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha pañca.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca sabbattha pañca
